# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book has the list of exercises for the Embedded C Programming Lab manual.

## IDEs

- STMCube IDE with STM HAL
- Arduino IDE (V2) with Stm32duino

## Development board

The exercise here are implemented using STM Nucleo-144 F767ZI development board.

## Components
- Built-in LEDs and Pushbutton
- Built-in Serial UART
- Ultrasonic sensor - HC-SR04 
- Temperature Sensor - MCP9808
- Accelerometer and gyroscope - MPU-6050
